title: Five new Steam games you probably missed (February 20, 2023)
description: Sorting through every new game on Steam so you don't have to.

title: Redfall production designer: 'Making a large, open world game, that was breaking the mold for us'
description: But it will still have "the things about Arkane's DNA that we love."

title: Rainbow Six Siege is revamping riot shields and overhauling the new player experience in 2023
description: A new map, big reworks, and operators from Brazil, Sweden, South Korea, and Portugal.

title: An AI that plays Minecraft for you got made, but it won't be released
description: An experiment created an AI that would play when given natural-language commands.

title: Wordle hint and answer #610: Sunday, February 19
description: Here's a Wordle hint to help you out and the full answer if you need it.

title: Great moments in PC gaming: Being thrown out a window in Gunpoint
Fighter management sim Punch Club gets a sequel
description: Punch Club 2: Fast Forward will be out this year.

title: See anime spaceship sim Jumplight Odyssey's gameplay reveal
description: It's like FTL meets The Sims, with pigs.

title: Dark Pinocchio soulslike Lies of P is coming out this year
description: Assuming that's not a lie, of course. Get the tape measure.
